channel.title: Is there such thing? [Delta]
channel.description: I just added chaotic maul but I would like to change the attack style to the hammer attack style, but i'm not sure how to do so. I used Item "pickup" command and a rune warhamer and torags hammers and they don't have the attack style, so I'm wondering if delta has the hammer attack style and if it does how would I go about putting this/giving these items the right attack style Thanks for your help

item.title: Is there such thing? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

I just added chaotic maul but I would like to change the attack style to the hammer attack style, but i’m not sure how to do so. I used Item “pickup” command and a rune warhamer and torags hammers and they don’t have the attack style, so I’m wondering if delta has the hammer attack style and if it does how would I go about putting this/giving these items the right attack style
Thanks for your help
